name: Launch Through The Ages
description:
Launch through the ages is a game about a space-rock named Willson and his attempts to return to space. He does his best to launch himself into space through the various ages of history.

Controls.

  • left arrow key = left
  • right arrow key = right
  • Space-bar = launch
  • arrow-keys to navigate menu.
  • space-bar to select

Credits.
